content.html: If in 5 years #COVID is discovered to cause cancer like HPV, Multiple Sclerosis like EBV, liver failure like HepC, or acts like VZV chicken pox in form of adult shingles…I don’t want to hear one cry of terror from anyone who gleefully shouted while removing mask on the plane.
